about_the_game:
Play free now!
You will be able to get a little taste of what awaits you on the complete version!
Online will be available in demo for limited time, enjoy :)
detailed_description:
Play free now!
You will be able to get a little taste of what awaits you on the complete version!
Online will be available in demo for limited time, enjoy :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2.2 GHz) or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 (2.6 GHz)
  • Graphics: Any WebGL Supported Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or Superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 240 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.

name: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Superior
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo (2.2 GHz) or AMD® Athlon™ 64 X2 (2.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any WebGL Supported Graphics Card
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or Superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 240 GT or ATI™ Radeon™ HD 4850
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is optional.

short_description: Play free now! You will be able to get a little taste of what awaits you on the complete version! Online will be available in demo for limited time, enjoy :)
